plot: The history of Bahrain's evolving democracy, from the establishment of Manama Municipality in 1919 to the National Charter Referendum in 2001 and the first meeting of the National Assembly in 2002.
title: Bridge of Light
plot_es: The history of Bahrain's evolving democracy, from the establishment of Manama Municipality in 1919 to the National Charter Referendum in 2001 and the first meeting of the National Assembly in 2002.
plot_en: The history of Bahrain's evolving democracy, from the establishment of Manama Municipality in 1919 to the National Charter Referendum in 2001 and the first meeting of the National Assembly in 2002.

cast.name: Salman bin Hamad bin Isa Al-Khalifa
King Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa
